resources.string: RickAndMortyQuiz
TRUE
FALSE
The Rick & Morty That The Show Follows\n Are Originally From Dimension C-173
Jerry\'s Station Wagon Is Based On The\n Car From National Lampoon\'s Vacation?
Rick & Morty Have Appeared In The Opening\n Title Screen Of The Simpsons?
Jaguar From \'Pickle Rick\' Had His Own\n Spin Off Show With Adult Swim?
Two Brothers\' Is The First Show\n Rick & Morty Watch On Inter-Dimensional Cable?
According To Dan Harmon, A Schmeckle\n Is Worth $148?
The Bloomflark Is The Universal\n Currency For The Galactic Federation?
When Bird-Person Is \'Reborn\' He Is\n Dubbed Phoenix-Bird?
Doctor Neon Bloom Runs Anatomy Park?
When Snuffles Is Able To Talk,\n He Changes His Name To Snowball?
"Wubba Lubba Dub Dub" Means \'Let\'s Party\'?
Leading Up To The First Episode,\n Rick Had Left Beth And The Family For 10 Year
In \'Total Rickall\', The Only Character\n That Isn\'t A Parasite Is Pencilvester?
Tammy Killed Bird-Person On Their\n Wedding Day?
When Being Scammed By The Zigereons,\n Rick\'s Safe Code Is \'1-3-5-3\'?
Ice-T\'s Real Name On Alphabetrium\n Was H2O-T?
When Jerry & Beth Split Up, Jerry\n Enters A Relationship With A Krootabulan?
The Episode \'Something Ricked This\n Way\' Is A Parody Of An Edgar Allen Poe Poem
Rick\'s Hivemind Ex-Lover Is Called\n Purity?
The Conjoint Twin That Simultaneously\n Host The News &v A Cooking Show Are\n Calle Michael & Pichael?
